title: Kylie Jenner dresses daughter Stormi up in her 'campy' lavender Met Gala look complete with wig
text:
She made quite the splash at this spring's fashionable Met Gala, and now her daughter is following in mom's footsteps in a wildly entertaining kid's costume for Halloween.

Kylie Jenner, who wore an eye-catching feathery lilac ensemble to the Metropolitan Museum's annual buzzy fundraiser in May, uploaded an irresistibly cute gallery of photos and video to her Instagram account and stories on Sunday showing daughter Stormi Webster, aged one and a half, in a twinning look.

The look, based on Kylie's Versace-designed gown, featured poofy lavender feathers at the sleeves and hem of the gown, which was constructed of flesh-toned fabric and silvery embroidery.

Little one in lilac: Kylie Jenner uploaded an irresistibly cute gallery to her Instagram on Sunday showing daughter Stormi in a look that twinned her ensemble from this year's Met Gala

At the Met Gala: Kylie showcased her ample cleavage in the pale purple number, which was a much more adult version of what Stormi wore over the weekend

The finishing touch, of course, was the little girl's long flowing lilac wig, which also matched mom Kylie's tresses from the gala to a T.

In the video Kylie shared, Stormi at first seems a little bewildered in the elaborate getup, but soon smiles while her mom, 22, is filming her.

At the Met Gala, which Kylie attended with then-boyfriend (and Stormi's father) Travis Scott, the young billionaire showcased her ample cleavage in the pale purple number, which was a much more adult version of what Stormi wore over the weekend.

Jenner captioned the snaps, which look like they were taken in Stormi's room at the Kylie Cosmetics offices (scene of the now-viral 'Rise and Shine' moment), with 'My baby!!!!!!!! i cant handle this!!!!' along with a string of heart emojis.

Super cute: In the video Kylie shared, Stormi at first seems a little bewildered in the elaborate getup...

Kylie's Met Gala look featured a strapless, slimming nude bodysuit that peeked through the mesh design.

Her curvy hips were on full display in the designer piece, with see-through elements along the skirt revealing Kylie's thighs before becoming feathered by the bottom.

Kylie had huge feathered sleeves that proved to be quite the statement in the mermaid-cut number.

The Kylie Cosmetics founder paired the strapless frock with sleek lavender locks that cascaded down her back, center parted.

...but she soon smiles while her mom is filming her

‹ Slide me › Like mother like daughter: The finishing touch for Stormi's look, of course, was the little girl's long flowing lilac wig, which matched Kylie's tresses from the gala to a T

It was said at the time that Kylie was inspired by Lil' Kim for the look, who also rocked a lavender wig and racy ensemble to the 1999 VMAs.

The theme for this year's Met Gala was 'Camp', which various celebrities took to mean very different things, as evidenced by the wild array of outfits modeled at the New York City springtime event.

Jenner's social media share came the day after Kylie went out on the town for a wild night with best friends Sofia Richie and Stassie Karanikolaou, during which they attended the J Balvin show and hung out with Will.I.Am.

As the night progressed, the younger half-sister of Kim Kardashian uploaded footage of herself partying for Halloween herself, dressed in another look inspired by a musician at the VMAs: this time, it was Madonna's all-black ensemble from the 2003 show, when she famously locked lips with Britney Spears and Christina Aguilera.

Pure drama: Kylie's Met Gala look featured a strapless, slimming nude bodysuit that peeked through the mesh design

Then a couple: Kylie attended the Met Gala with then-boyfriend (and Stormi's father) Travis Scott
description: She made quite the splash at this spring's fashionable Met Gala, and now her daughter is following in mom's footsteps in a wildly entertaining kid's costume for Halloween.
